name: Purr Evil (Vi_Lesiege)
description:
This is a 2 players game made at Global Game Jam Montreal 2016. The theme was Ritual.

Press the letters shown by your kitty on the Ouija Board as many time as asked.

Romeo press Space to submit your key

Princess press Enter to submit your key

You have to share the keyboard and to hurry!

Anouck Belthoise - @lelyss

JF Morin : @holyrum

Marion Esquian :https://mayhow.itch.io - @mayhow

Virginie Lesiège : @Vi_lesiege
